Text: Menemen:  The town of Menemen is located at a distance of 35 km from İzmir center (Konak Square).

<Text: Menemen:  The economy still relies on agriculture and stock breeding in large part, although the production and export of leather, ceramic and other earthenware products, as well as potentially of plastic products, based in two separate and specialized organized industrial zones made important steps forward during the last decade.>

<Text: Menemen:  Menemen's earthenware pottery products are famous across Turkey since centuries.>
